name: Foldable Camping Bed with Bag | Portable and Lightweight Aluminium Bed for Outdoors
description:
Foldable Aluminium Camping Bed- stretcher / Outdoor cot.

QUICK SETUP & COMPACT STORAGE: Set up camp in no time with our camping bed, featuring a practical folding frame for easy use. The frame folds out quickly and can be packed away just as easily. The foldable bed ensures compact storage in your car boot, tent, shed, or garage when not in use. Whether for camping, travel, or fishing trips, this fold out bed is ready when you are, offering quick and hassle-free setup on the go.
WEATHER-RESISTANT & DURABLE: Built for the outdoors, this camping cot features a durable aluminium frame that resists rust and water. For added convenience, the outdoor bed also has a spacious lying surface made from water-repellent polyester, making it easy to wipe off rain or water spills. Whether you're looking for a fishing bed for a weekend trip or a travel bed for a festival, this fold away bed is both comfortable and durable for all your outdoor adventures.
STRONG & STABLE FRAME: Enjoy comfortable and reliable use with our single camp bed, resting on a robust aluminium frame. For enhanced stability, the field bed is equipped with non-slip, floor-friendly plastic feet, ensuring a steady footing on various surfaces and terrains. Whether for indoor use as a guest bed or outdoor use as a tent bed, the floor-friendly feet are gentle on any surface, while the robust frame ensures great stability.
PORTABLE & LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN: Bring your folding camp bed with you anywhere on the go with minimal effort. The lightweight yet durable aluminium frame folds down neatly into the included carry bag, allowing you to easily transport the foldaway bed. Whether youâ€™re trekking, at a music festival, or heading on a camping trip, this travel-friendly, portable bed is always ready to go, designed for compact and lightweight transport.
SPACIOUS & LOW-MAINTENANCE SURFACE: Sleep in comfort wherever you are with our camping cot bed. The folding bed offers a spacious suspended surface, designed to offer firm support and ample room for rest. Made from weather-resistant materials, the raised camping bed is also easy to clean and maintain as rain and spills can simply be wiped off the water-repellent cover. Suitable as both an indoor spare bed for guests or an outdoor camp cot, the foldable bed combines comfort with minimal upkeep.
